
## Class : mucosa of main bronchus

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0005036
 * *Label* = mucosa of main bronchus
 * *Definition* = A mucosa that is part of a main bronchus [Automatically generated definition].
